email_sender.label: Email From
email_sender.info: Emails sent by gitlab will come from this email address

email_sender_alias.info: Messages sent to the Email From address will be delivered to this account or group

default_project.visibility_level.info: How visible should your gitlab application be to the world?

choices.label: internal
choices.info: Gitlab will be in internal mode
